Ridiculous. If you can afford to tip a service person with "both" then tip them twice the amount in fiat. It's not right to try to push crypto on service people who live off tips.

I'm not sure why people are having a hard time understanding that tipping a service professional whose income depends on tips is not the right time to try to promote cryptos to an uninterested outsider. I've donated more bitcoin to more people than most, but I tip USD.
Leaving a crypto-currency tip to someone who didn't ask for crypto-currency is rude and inconsiderate. Tipping is about gratitude not promotion of your project or interest.
